Rulings.Goat:
● If “Monster Reborn” or another Spell Card that can Special Summon a monster was activated with all 5 of the Monster Zone spaces already filled, would that be considered an illegal activation or does it simply resolve without effect? 
A: It would only be an illegal activation if 5 monsters existed on their side of the field when Monster Reborn was activated.

Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] When activating "Monster Reborn", you activate the card and choose a target before your opponent decides whether or not to Chain to it.
